name: sap-sipper

effect.x_y: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.

short_effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
